lead_paragraph: Spanish cyclist Alberto Contador is targeting a third Tour de France victory in 2017 with his new American team Trek-Segafredo and believes Team Sky will again provide the biggest challenge.

headline.print_headline: Contador Banks on Team Work to Challenge Sky
headline.main: Contador Banks on Team Work to Challenge Sky
